ygData.subject: RE: Interesting paper about increasing complexity by removing selection pressure in a model of domesticated bird evolution
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Oliver, thanks for pointing out this very interesting example of the implications of reducing fitness-driven selective pressure.  While their simulation may
